name: Fouita Smart Widgets
author: Fouita

sections.installation:
Please follow our documentation guide: get started with fouita

If you have any question, don’t hesitate to approach us support@fouita.com.
sections.faq:
Q: Can i control in which pages widgets will appear ?

A: Yes, you have the full control to choose when and where to show or hide your widgets. You can add them in one page or many pages at once.

Q: Do I need to create an account in Fouita to use the plugin ?

A: Yes, you need a Fouita account to be able to access the widgets. Then you need to bring your Project ID from Fouita to use it in your WordPress website.

Q: Do i need to create a project for each widget ?

A: No, a single project you create in Fouita can include multiple widgets, you only need 1 project for each website you own.
sections.description:
Interact more with your customers, Fouita is the best way to power up your website with widgets, Integrate Fouita widgets into your wordpress website using only the project key from your dashboard. Try it now and create an authetic customer experience for your visitors!

Fouita is the smart widgets builder that generates more leads from your website

  • Monitor your flow of widgets to create interaction.
  • Choose when and where you want your widget to be displayed.
  • You can add as many widgets as you want.
  • You have access to your widgets performance through analytics.
    Try our smart widgets now!
    With Fouita, your website won’t be boring anymore. You create a full customer experience for your website visitors and retain them more. Additonnally, you have many versions for ready integrations. Start now !
    This is an install any widget plugin. Once the plugin is installed, you can add any widget in our marketplace.

WHY DO I NEED Fouita Widgets?

After embedding Fouita widgets, you will be able to:
– Increase customer retention and aquisition
– Boost user engagement
– Increase visibility
– Increase sales through user friendly widgets
– Easier A/B testing and Track customer activity for a better decision making
– Faster communication with customers through popups or alerts on the website
– Manage Ads campaigns more efficiently through a conditional widget flow
– Save 10x time and resources integrating a popular SAAS (Airtable, Slack, Hubspot, Zoho) to the website
– Easy widget installation and management
– Social network integration (instagram, twitter, google)
– Integrate reviews to the website
– Add FAQ section easily
– Add Any widget that is available online easily

INSTALLATION GUIDE

Fouita is the smart widgets builder that brings traffic to your website

  • Monitor your flow of widgets to create interaction.
  • Choose when and where you want your widget to be displayed.
  • You can add as many widgets as you want.
  • You have access to your widgets performance through analytics.
    Try our smart widgets now!
    With Fouita, your website won’t be boring anymore. You create a full customer experience for your website visitors and retain them more. Additonnally, you have many versions for ready integrations. Start now !
    This is an install any widget plugin. Once the plugin is installed, you can add any widget in our marketplace.

WHY DO I NEED Fouita Widgets?

After embedding Fouita widgets, you will be able to:
– Increase customer retention and aquisition
– Boost user engagement
– Increase visibility
– Increase sales through user friendly widgets
– Easier A/B testing and Track customer activity for a better decision making
– Faster communication with customers through popups or alerts on the website
– Manage Ads campaigns more efficiently through a conditional widget flow
– Save 10x time and resources integrating a popular SAAS (Airtable, Slack, Hubspot, Zoho) to the website
– Easy widget installation and management
– Social network integration (instagram, twitter, google)
– Integrate reviews to the website
– Add FAQ section easily
– Add Any widget that is available online easily

How this plugin works?

This plugin makes an external call to Fouita script to load all the widgets that you picked from Fouita.
Although you can include Fouita script using the full script tag provided in your dashborad, this plugin requires only your fouita project ID.

INSTALLATION GUIDE

Widgets installation is a quick operation. Check the Screenshots and then get started with fouita.
Your time is priceless, embed widgets and spoil your users.

Get in touch!

Don’t hesitate ! It’s time to make your customers return to your website.
* Website
* Send us an Email at: support@fouita.com

1. Wordpress settings panel

  2. Add project

  4. Remove project

  6. Access your widget from list components

  7. Check which integrations fit with your website

sections.reviews:
Awesome readymade widgets for your website.

By vivekghildiyal on March 26, 2023

If you are looking for adding more functionality to your website without worrying too much about coding everything yourself, Get Fouita now.

What I liked:

1: Fast loading times.
2: Many Widget options to choose from.
3: Supportive founder and team.
4: Easy to set up your widgets.
